name: Kigali City Tour
description: Explore Rwanda's vibrant capital, its culture, history, and innovation. Visit the Genocide Memorial, experience local markets, and see modern Rwanda's development.

name: Lake Kivu Escape
description: Relax by the stunning Lake Kivu, one of Africa's Great Lakes. Enjoy water sports, coffee plantation tours, and breathtaking sunsets over the Congo Nile Trail.

name: Nyungwe Forest Adventure
description: Trek through one of Africa's oldest rainforests with incredible biodiversity. Experience the famous canopy walkway, track chimpanzees, and discover 300+ bird species.

name: Volcanoes Gorilla Trek
description: Encounter mountain gorillas in their natural habitat in Volcanoes National Park. A once-in-a-lifetime experience with Rwanda's most iconic wildlife.

name: Akagera National Park Safari
description: Experience Rwanda's only savannah park with the Big Five. Enjoy game drives, boat safaris on Lake Ihema, and witness diverse wildlife including lions, elephants, and rhinos.

name: Karongi Lake Kivu
description: Discover the serene town of Karongi on Lake Kivu's shores. Visit Napoleon Island, explore caves, and enjoy kayaking in this peaceful lakeside paradise.

name: Huye Cultural Experience
description: Rwanda's intellectual capital offers rich cultural experiences. Visit the National Museum, King's Palace, and experience traditional Rwandan culture and dance.

name: Gishwati-Mukura Forest
description: Explore Rwanda's newest national park with pristine forests, chimpanzee populations, and unique biodiversity. Perfect for nature lovers and researchers.

name: Rubavu Beach & Town
description: The largest town on Lake Kivu's shores offers beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and stunning views of the Congolese mountains across the lake.

name: Musanze Town & Caves
description: The gateway to Volcanoes National Park also offers fascinating cave systems formed by ancient volcanic activity. Explore underground passages and historical hideouts.

name: Rusizi District Tour
description: Explore the border town between Rwanda and Congo, featuring beautiful tea plantations, traditional crafts, and access to Nyungwe Forest.

name: Kigali Genocide Memorial Sites
description: A profound journey through Rwanda's history. Visit multiple memorial sites to understand the 1994 genocide and Rwanda's remarkable journey of reconciliation.

name: Congo Nile Trail Trek
description: Hike or bike along the stunning 227km Congo Nile Trail following Lake Kivu's eastern shores. Experience rural Rwanda, tea plantations, and spectacular views.

name: Bisoke Volcano Hike
description: Climb Mount Bisoke (3,711m) to reach the stunning crater lake at its summit. A challenging but rewarding full-day hike with magnificent views.

name: Lake Muhazi Recreation
description: A peaceful retreat near Kigali perfect for weekend getaways. Enjoy fishing, kayaking, bird watching, and relaxing by this scenic elongated lake.

name: Nyanza Royal Palace
description: Visit the traditional seat of Rwanda's monarchy. The restored palace features traditional architecture, royal artifacts, and the famous long-horned Inyambo cattle.

name: Eastern Rwanda Safari Circuit
description: Combine Akagera safari with visits to Lake Muhazi and local communities. Experience wildlife, culture, and stunning landscapes in Rwanda's eastern region.

name: Coffee Tour Experience
description: Learn about Rwanda's world-class coffee production from bean to cup. Visit coffee plantations, participate in picking and roasting, and enjoy tastings.
